channel.title: Claude Gravelle

item.title: Mentioned by Bay Today
item.description:
The protection of source water exceeds riding boundries

item.title: Mentioned by NorthBayNipissing.com
item.description:
Private members bill targets Trout Lake
Nickel Belt MP Claude Gravelle has introduced a private member's bill to re-instate protections on Trout Lake after they were removed last year. “We're particularly concerned about the lakes that supply drinking water. We're concerned about all of the bodies ...
